subject: Football
lead_paragraph: After surgery to repair torn knee ligaments cost him nearly all of 2008, Shawne Merriman says he fully expects to revitalize the Chargers’ pass rush and energize the defense.
snippet: After surgery to repair torn knee ligaments cost him nearly all of 2008, Shawne Merriman says he fully expects to revitalize the Chargers’ pass rush and energize the defense.
